definition: Li Xiannian (1909-1992), PRC general and politician
plum
surname Li
early/prior/former/in advance/first

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: Li Xiannian was one of the major decision-makers and leaders in the construction of Baoshan Steelworks.
sentences.chinese: 李先念是宝钢建设的主要决策人和领导人之一。
